sourcesContent:
import axios from 'axios' import { useEffect } from 'react' const Info = ({countries, countryData, setCountryData}) => { const country = countries[0][0] axios .get(`https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/restcountries/api/name/${country}`) .then(response => { setCountryData(response.data) }) .catch(() => null) if (countries.length !== 1) return null if (!countryData.name) return null return (

{country}

{`capital ${countryData.capital}`}

{`area ${countryData.area}`}

languages:

    {(Object.entries(countryData.languages).map((language) => (
  • {language[1]}
    • )))}
) } export default Info
